query:
SELECT
            SUB1.USERNAME,
            COALESCE(SUM(POINTS), 0)::INT AS "point_total!"
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    USERS.ID AS USER_ID,
                    USERS.USERNAME
                FROM
                    USERS
                    JOIN SUBSCRIPTIONS ON USERS.ID = SUBSCRIPTIONS.USER_ID
                WHERE
                    SUBSCRIPTIONS.BOOK_ID = $1
            ) AS SUB1
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT
                    PICKS.USER_ID,
                    PICKS.POINTS
                FROM
                    PICKS
                WHERE
                    PICKS.BOOK_ID = $1
            ) AS SUB2 ON SUB1.USER_ID = SUB2.USER_ID
        GROUP BY
            SUB1.USER_ID,
            SUB1.USERNAME
        ORDER BY
            "point_total!",
            USERNAME
